name: Spring Adventures | 2D jump game for Android !
name_original: Spring Adventures | 2D jump game for Android !
description:
Spring Adventures 

Spring Adventures is a 2d jump game for android Devices ! 

Tie up your jumping shoes and get ready to jump ! 

GamePlay ~ 

Touch Screen : 

touch and hold your screen to build pressure between your feet and spring. 

Release your touch to jump ! 

try to land on the slopes ! if you fall down { Game - Over }

Charters ~  

Many different types of characters available to play with ! 

But you need to unlock them by collecting diamonds .

1.) Dino

2.) Cutie

3.) Ninja

4.) Adventurous girl 

5.) Santa

6.) Zombie boy

7.) Zombie girl 

Other ~

any more exciting levels ! and power ups ! ☺
